title: Given partial P, direction rxn proceeds to equil.

content.prompt:
2 XY(g) â‡„ X2(g) + Y2(g)               Kp = 230

A certain gas, XY(g), decomposes as represented by the equation above. A sample of each of the three gases is put in a previously evacuated container. The initial partial pressures of the gases are shown in the table below.

The temperature of the reaction mixture is held constant. In which direction will the reaction proceed?

choices.label: The mixture is at equilibrium, so there will be no change.
It cannot be determined unless the volume of the container is known.

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
